channel.title: National Association of Educational Broadcasters Convention 1968
channel.description:
These recordings feature highlights from the 1968 National Association of Educational Broadcasters Annual Convention, held in Washington, D.C.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: National Association of Educational Broadcasters Convention 1968

item.title: Frank Pace - Reel 1 of 2
item.description: Remarks by Frank Pace, Jr., former secretary of the Army, chief executive officer of General Dynamics Corporation, and the first chairman of the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.
item.dc:creator: American University (Washington, D.C.)
item.dc:subject: United States

item.description: Remarks by Frank Pace, Jr., former secretary of the Army, chief executive officer of General Dynamics Corporation, and the first chairman of the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.
item.dc:creator: American University (Washington, D.C.)
